__TOC__

   Tim Nakos is a Ubuntu beta tester.  He has been working on the Ubuntu Project for about 6 months.  He has contributed to the Xserver Project and has double checked many lines of BIN.  He is currently beta testing Ubuntu 8.04 Hardy Heron and is on the Ubuntu 8.04 development team.  Tim has interests in music and plays the drums.  He also has contributed his knowledge  to the Fedora Project.  He has reported about 75 errors and suggestions to Ubuntu's Program Team.  Tim was first introduced to Linux by his father about 2 1/2 years ago and has been using Ubuntu for about 1 year.  If you need to contact Tim his email is tnakos@ejhs.k12.vt.us
